products.title: Gloss White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Gloss Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Persia Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Persia Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Powder Green Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Powder Green Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Ash Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Perfect Fit Ash Wood Venetian Blinds. Combine the luxury Sunwood collection of 25mm Wood Venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with UPVC windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.
products.productdescription: Amid-greyshade, theAsh Grey25mm Perfect Fit blind will give any room the modern feel, this colour oozes with class. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the Perfect Fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in Yorkshire, the Perfect Fit frame is made from Aluminium, with UV-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the Perfect Fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinating greyheadrail and asilver bottom bar, with a clear operating handle and control wand.

products.title: Morena Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Perfect Fit Morena Wood Venetian Blinds. Combine the luxury Sunwood collection of 25mm Wood Venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with UPVC windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.
products.productdescription: An sumptuous beige colour, the Morena 25mm Perfect Fit blindwill bring warmth into any room. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the Perfect Fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in Yorkshire, the Perfect Fit frame is made from Aluminium, with UV-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the Perfect Fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinating beige brownheadrail and a whitebottom bar, with a clear operating handle and control wand.

products.title: Meadow Flower asc Spring Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Meadow Flower asc Spring Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX80012. An elegant, dim-out pleated blind produced with an asc, solar reflective, backing.
products.productdescription: Part of our Meadow Flower range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ASC refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above. If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.title: Infusion asc Stone Grey Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Infusion ASC Stone Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4137. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which  improves energy efficiency
products.productdescription: Infusion ASC Stone Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ASC refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window. This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee! This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above. If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.title: Pure Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame
products.metadescription: Perfect Fit Pure Wood Venetian Blinds. Combine the luxury Sunwood collection of 25mm Wood Venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with UPVC windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.
products.productdescription: A brilliant white shade, the Pure White 25mm Perfect Fit blind will give any room that modern look, and sit well against any AnthraciteuPVC window or door. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the Perfect Fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in Yorkshire, the Perfect Fit frame is made from Aluminium, with UV-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the Perfect Fit frame the blind uses acolour co-ordinating white headrail and a colour co-ordinating white bottom bar.

products.title: Infusion asc Ecru Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Infusion ASC Ecru Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4146. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which  improves energy efficiency
products.productdescription: Infusion asc Ecru Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ASC refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window. This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above. If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.title: Infusion asc Cream Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Infusion ASC Cream Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4102. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which  improves energy efficiency
products.productdescription: Infusion asc Cream Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ASC refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window. This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee! This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above. If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.title: Hazel Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Perfect Fit Hazel Wood Venetian Blinds. Combine the luxury Sunwood collection of 25mm Wood Venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with UPVC windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.
products.productdescription: A dark brown shade, the Hazel25mm Perfect Fit blind willbe the final part of your interior jigsaw. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the Perfect Fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in Yorkshire, the Perfect Fit frame is made from Aluminium, with UV-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the Perfect Fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinatingbrownheadrail and abrownbottom bar, with a clear operating handle and control wand.

Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ASC refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window. This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee! This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above. If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.title: Infusion asc Calico Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Infusion ASC Calico Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4125. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which  improves energy efficiency

products.title: Glam Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Glam Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Hive Lusso Stone Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Hive Lusso Ice White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX71001. A luxurious dim-out blind, produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric.
